jade.core
Class Messenger

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Messenger
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Actor, World
public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Base class for both Actor and World. Allows all the messages to be propagated to one central spot and given to the user.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
Messenger()
          Creates a new Messenger
 
Method Summary
 void appendMessage(java.lang.String message)
          Appends a new message to the previous messages.
 void clearMessages()
          Clears any messages the Messenger has.
 java.lang.String getMessages()
          Retrieves the messages from this Messenger, leaving the Messenger's messages blank.
 void retrieveMessages(Messenger messenger)
          Removes the messages from the given Messenger and appends them to this Messenger's messages.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Messenger

public Messenger()
Creates a new Messenger

Method Detail

clearMessages

public final void clearMessages()
Clears any messages the Messenger has.

appendMessage

public final void appendMessage(java.lang.String message)
Appends a new message to the previous messages. The message is ensured to end with ". "

retrieveMessages

public final void retrieveMessages(Messenger messenger)
Removes the messages from the given Messenger and appends them to this Messenger's messages.

getMessages

public final java.lang.String getMessages()
Retrieves the messages from this Messenger, leaving the Messenger's messages blank.
